weekly picks (Mar 3 week 2022)

Posted on March 14, 2022 in 2022mar 

A WordCloud of 2022 Mar 3rd week collection

  1. http://arxiv.org/abs/2203.07551 Fe-based high field superconductors for cost-effective future accelerator magnets (arXiv.org)

  2. http://arxiv.org/abs/2203.07380 Bipolaronic high-temperature superconductivity (AJMillis, arXiv.org)

  3. http://arxiv.org/abs/2203.07575 Electron-hole symmetry in quasiparticle spectral weight of cuprates observed via infrared and photoemission spectroscopy (JSHwang, arXiv.org)

  4. http://arxiv.org/abs/2203.07453 Dissipation Induced Flat Bands (flatband, arXiv.org)

  5. http://arxiv.org/abs/2203.07607 Magnetically hidden state on the ground floor of the magnetic Devil’s staircase (devil, arXiv.org)

  6. http://arxiv.org/abs/2203.07432 Nontrivial doping evolution of electronic properties in Ising-superconducting alloys (arXiv.org)

  7. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevLett.128.117601 Enhancement of the Magnetoelectric Effect Using the Dynamic Jahn-Teller Effect in a Transition-Metal Complex (PRL)

  8. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.115120 Magnetotransport and high-resolution angle-resolved photoelectron spectroscopy studies of palladium-doped ${\mathrm{Bi}}{2}{\mathrm{Te}}{3}$ (PRB)

  9. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.103.195116 Transport in the non-Fermi liquid phase of isotropic Luttinger semimetals (PRB)

  10. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.125118 Crystallography of hyperbolic lattices (PRB)

  11. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.115303 Orientation-dependent Rashba spin-orbit coupling of two-dimensional hole gases in semiconductor quantum wells: Linear or cubic (Rashba, PRB)

  12. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.115414 Unified ab initio description of Frohlich electron-phonon interactions in two-dimensional and three-dimensional materials (PRB)

  13. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.125119 Metamagnetism and crystal-field splitting in pseudohexagonal ${\mathrm{CeRh}}{3}{\mathrm{Si}}{2}$ (Ce, PRB)

  14. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.L121109 Possible Dirac quantum spin liquid in the kagome quantum antiferromagnet ${\mathrm{YCu}}{3}{(\mathrm{OH})}{6}{\mathrm{Br}}{2}[{\mathrm{Br}}{x}{(\mathrm{OH})}_{1\ensuremath{-}x}]$ (kagome, PRB)

  15. https://physics.aps.org/articles/v15/37 Optical Sensor for a Pancreas-on-a-Chip (Physics)

  16. https://doi.org/10.1021/acs.nanolett.1c04803 Anisotropic DzyaloshinskiiâMoriya Interaction and Topological Magnetism in Two-Dimensional Magnets Protected by P-4m2 Crystal Symmetry (Nano Letters)

  17. http://arxiv.org/abs/2203.07365 Intertwining orbital current order and superconductivity in Kagome metal (arXiv.org)

  18. http://arxiv.org/abs/2203.06971 Little-Parks like oscillations in lightly doped cuprate superconductors (arXiv.org)

  19. http://arxiv.org/abs/2203.06946 Eliashberg theory of the Jahn-Teller-Hubbard model (arXiv.org)

  20. http://arxiv.org/abs/2203.06532 Self-consistent theory of current injection into $d$ and $d + is$ superconductors (arXiv.org)

  21. http://arxiv.org/abs/2203.06192 Supercurrent induced resonant optical response (arXiv.org)

  22. http://arxiv.org/abs/2203.06893 Superconductor vortex spectrum from Fermi arc states in Weyl semimetals (LiangFu, arXiv.org)

  23. http://arxiv.org/abs/2203.06432 Kondo interaction in FeTe and its potential role in the magnetic order (CKim, arXiv.org)

  24. http://arxiv.org/abs/2203.07321 Possible chiral spin liquid state in the $S=1/2$ kagome Heisenberg model (arXiv.org)

  25. http://arxiv.org/abs/2203.07015 Comparative structural evolution under pressure of powder and single crystals of the layered antiferromagnet FePS$_3$ (arXiv.org)

  26. http://arxiv.org/abs/2203.06193 Strategy to Extract Kitaev Interaction using Symmetry in Honeycomb Mott Insulators (Kee, arXiv.org)

  27. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevLett.128.116803 Acoustic Mobius Insulators from Projective Symmetry (PRL)

  28. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevLett.128.116802 Projectively Enriched Symmetry and Topology in Acoustic Crystals (PRL)

  29. https://physics.aps.org/articles/v15/36 Acoustic Crystals with a Mobius Twist (Physics)

  30. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevLett.128.116801 Anderson Localization in the Fractional Quantum Hall Effect (PRL)

  31. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevLett.128.117201 Thermal Hall Effect of Magnons in Collinear Antiferromagnetic Insulators: Signatures of Magnetic and Topological Phase Transitions (PRL)

  32. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.115116 $\ensuremath{\pi}$ phase shift across stripes in a charge density wave system (PRB)

  33. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.115119 Rotoinversion-symmetric bulk-hinge correspondence and its applications to higher-order Weyl semimetals (PRB)

  34. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.125116 Linear magnetoresistance induced by mobility fluctuations in iodine-intercalated tungsten ditelluride (WTe2I, PRB)

  35. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.094203 FFLO state driven by quasiperiodic Zeeman field and its transition to localized states (PRB)

  36. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.094419 Mechanism of length-induced magnetism in polyacene molecules (PRB)

  37. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.104507 Spin-triplet superconductivity driven by finite-momentum spin fluctuations (PRB)

  38. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.115117 Topological edge modes without symmetry in quasiperiodically driven spin chains (PRB)

  39. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.115118 Giant Chern number of a Weyl nodal surface without upper limit (PRB)

  40. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.115410 Topological gap labeling with third Chern numbers in three-dimensional quasicrystals (PRB)

  41. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.115411 Nonlinear Hall effect induced by internal Coulomb interaction and phase relaxation process in a four-terminal system with time-reversal symmetry (PRB)

  42. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.115413 Spatially controlled graphene-${\mathrm{MoSe}}_{2}$ lateral heterostructure for sensing applications: Insights from first-principles calculations (PRB)

  43. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.125410 Existence of interfacial polaronic plasmon: A comparative study between $\mathrm{FeSe}/{\mathrm{SrTiO}}{3}$ and $\mathrm{CoSe}/{\mathrm{SrTiO}}{3}$ (PRB)

  44. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.L121107 Visualizing the out-of-plane electronic dispersions in an intercalated transition metal dichalcogenide (PRB)

  45. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.L121108 Footprints of Kitaev spin liquid in the Fano lineshape of Raman-active optical phonons (PRB)

  46. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.094417 Antiferromagnetic domain wall dynamics in magnetoelectric ${\mathrm{MnTiO}}_{3}$ studied by optical imaging (PRB)

  47. http://arxiv.org/abs/2203.05867 Tunable superconductivity at the oxide-insulator/KTaO$_3$ interface and its origin (arXiv.org)

  48. http://arxiv.org/abs/2203.05770 Muon-spin relaxation study of the layered kagome superconductor CsV$_3$Sb$_5$ (arXiv.org)

  49. http://arxiv.org/abs/2203.05650 Superconducting dome by tuning through a Van Hove singularity in a two-dimensional metal (arXiv.org)

  50. http://arxiv.org/abs/2203.05894 Crossed Andreev reflection in spin-polarized chiral edge states due to Meissner effect (Jelena, arXiv.org)

  51. http://arxiv.org/abs/2203.05669 Enhancing $T_{\mathrm{c}}$ in a composite superconductor/metal bilayer system: a dynamical cluster approximation study (DCA++, arXiv.org)
